I cannot understand why 11 people have given a negative quality vote for this torrent. This rip is as perfect as it's possible for such an old film. The quality vote here should be for TECHNICAL quality, and not for whether or not you LIKE the film. The liking kan be voted on Imdb. After all, you have to have SEEN a film to know if you liked it.
